verses.name: John 13:9
verses.text: Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.

verses.name: John 13:10
verses.text: Jesus saith to him, He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet, but is clean every whit: and ye are clean, but not all.

verses.name: John 13:11
verses.text: For he knew who should betray him; therefore said he, Ye are not all clean.

verses.name: John 13:12
verses.text: So after he had washed their feet, and had taken his garments, and was set down again, he said unto them, Know ye what I have done to you?
